com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout

Class FlowLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.layout.FlowLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutManager, Serializable

    public class FlowLayout
extends Object
implements LayoutManager
    FlowLayout is a LayoutManager that emulates FlowLayout.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FlowLayout.Alignment
      This is used to control the alignment of the components.
      static class  FlowLayout.ContentAlignment
      This is used to control the alignment of the content in each cell.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FlowLayout.Alignment CENTER
      This value indicates that each row of components should be centered.
      static FlowLayout.Alignment LEFT
      This value indicates that each row of components should be left-justified.
      static FlowLayout.Alignment RIGHT
      This value indicates that each row of components should be right-justified.
      static FlowLayout.Alignment VERTICAL
      This value indicates that each component should be placed on a new row.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FlowLayout()
      Constructs a new FlowLayout with a centered alignment and no horizontal or vertical gap.
      FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment)
      Constructs a new FlowLayout with the specified alignment and no horizontal or vertical gap.
      FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment, FlowLayout.ContentAlignment contentAlignment)
      Constructs a new FlowLayout with the specified alignment (no horizontal or vertical gap) and content alignment.
      FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment, int hgap, int vgap)
      Creates a new flow layout manager with the indicated alignment and horizontal and vertical gaps.
      FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment, int hgap, int vgap, FlowLayout.ContentAlignment contentAlignment)
      Creates a new flow layout manager with the indicated alignment, horizontal and vertical gaps and content alignment.

      • LEFT

        public static final FlowLayout.Alignment LEFT
        This value indicates that each row of components should be left-justified.

        This value indicates that each row of components should be centered.

        This value indicates that each row of components should be right-justified.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlowLayout

        public FlowLayout()
        Constructs a new FlowLayout with a centered alignment and no horizontal or vertical gap.

      • FlowLayout

        public FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment)
        Constructs a new FlowLayout with the specified alignment and no horizontal or vertical gap.
        Parameters:
        alignment - the alignment of the components

      • FlowLayout

        public FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment,
                  FlowLayout.ContentAlignment contentAlignment)
        Constructs a new FlowLayout with the specified alignment (no horizontal or vertical gap) and content alignment.
        Parameters:
        alignment - the alignment of the components
        contentAlignment - the alignment of the content in each cell

      • FlowLayout

        public FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment,
                  int hgap,
                  int vgap)
        Creates a new flow layout manager with the indicated alignment and horizontal and vertical gaps.
        Parameters:
        alignment - the alignment of the components
        hgap - the horizontal gap between the cells, measured in pixels.
        vgap - the vertical gap between the cells, measured in pixels.

      • FlowLayout

        public FlowLayout(FlowLayout.Alignment alignment,
                  int hgap,
                  int vgap,
                  FlowLayout.ContentAlignment contentAlignment)
        Creates a new flow layout manager with the indicated alignment, horizontal and vertical gaps and content alignment.
        Parameters:
        alignment - the alignment of the components
        hgap - the horizontal gap between the cells, measured in pixels.
        vgap - the vertical gap between the cells, measured in pixels.
        contentAlignment - the alignment of the content in each cell

    • Method Detail

        Returns:

        Returns:
        the horizontal gap between the cells, measured in pixels.

      • getVgap

        public int getVgap()
        Returns:
        the vertical gap between the cells, measured in pixels.

      • getContentAlignment

        public FlowLayout.ContentAlignment getContentAlignment()
        Returns:
        the alignment of the content in each cell.
